name: Fanfiction.net Dark Style
description: Complete re-skinning of fanfiction.net, includes no-select jail-breaking. Uses light-grey-blue on dark grey.
additional_info:
v0.2 31/08/2017
-fixed some issues with floating elements
-Did the main sections of the logged-in area. Things such as forums etc have not been done since I have never actually used them...

v.0.1
-fixed a background glitch/inconsistancy around hovering buttons.
-above fix necessitated new background for text settings buttons. they now have a new bar with rounded ends that looks nicer than before.
x-still a few white items in the user control panel to be fixed. will get to them in the next release.
